code: import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import React from'react';import db from'../firebase';import'./Todo.css';function Todo(_ref){var todo=_ref.todo;var handleDelete=function handleDelete(){db.collection('todos').doc(todo.id).delete();};var editUp=function editUp(e){var p=e.target.parentElement.children[0];var button=e.target.parentElement.children[1];if(button.textContent==='Update'){(function(){db.collection('todos').doc(todo.id).set({todo:p.textContent},{merge:true});button.textContent='Edit';p.setAttribute('contenteditable','false');})();}else if(button.textContent==='Edit'){(function(){p.setAttribute('contenteditable','true');p.focus();button.textContent='Update';})();}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(React.Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:todo.todo}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"edit",onClick:editUp,children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:handleDelete,children:"Delete"})]})});}export default Todo;
